content.text:
Security Protocol EAh is assigned for NVMe interface use (refer to ACS-4). This protocol may be used in
Security Receive and Security Send commands. The specific usage type is defined by the Security Protocol
Specific Field defined in Figure 396.

tables.title: Table_5_2_24_3_Security_Protocol_EAh
tables.table_md:
| SP Specific (SPSP) Value | Definition | NVMe Security Specific Field (NSSF) Definition |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| 0001h | Replay Protected Memory Block | RPMB Target |
| 0002h | CDP Authentication | CDP Authentication |
| 0003h to FFFh | Reserved | Reserved |
